statement.p: Out of the last 42 days, it rained 8 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{8}}{{42}}={0.19047619047619}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.19047619047619}={19.047619047619} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 19.05 .
